meanings.definition: A type of thermoplastic polymer used in a wide variety of applications.
meanings.sent1: Polypropylenes are commonly found in household items like containers and bottles.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced a batch of polypropylenes for packaging materials.
meanings.sent3: At the plastic recycling plant, the polypropylenes had a party to celebrate their reuse.
meanings.sent4: The versatility of polypropylenes is like having a toolbox full of solutions.
meanings.sent5: When heated, polypropylenes can be molded into different shapes easily.
